short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop phishing with Retruster. Be alerted to phishing emails with the best anti phishing tool.

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_419,et,:
Retruster Lite provides basic insights into where your emails are coming from
Retruster Lite gives you the basics to protect yourself from phishing today.

Retruster is an add-on to your Outlook, that constantly guards against phishing attempts using the most advanced tools. It warns of incoming attacks, gives specific information, and presents this information in a user-friendly and accessible way everyone can relate to.

Installation is super quick and easy, and you can be up and running in no time, with no advanced installation required. Click "Get it now", and Retruster will be added to your Outlook, where you can also deploy it to as many members of your organization as you want. When you open for the first time, you'll need to authorize yourself using your Office 365 log-in, and that's it! You're protected.

Contact us for any further questions you may have by visiting our Contact page.

Don't be the next victim. Every incoming message is tested and the results displayed in an easy-to-understand way that ensures that everyone in your organization is protected from the threat of phishing.

Retruster can form part of a multi-layered security approach, and is compatible with most anti-virus and anti-spam products. Retruster is your last line of defense against phishing and fraud.

At Retruster, we understand that first and foremost you have a business to run - we don’t put extra stress on your servers, and you won’t notice us in loading speeds or email delivery times at all. The product is fast and effective.

Retruster Lite is ideal for individuals who need protection from phishing attempts without the need for Retruster's advanced premium features.

Retruster can form part of a multi-layered security approach, and is compatible with most anti-virus and anti-spam products. Retruster is your last line of defense against phishing and fraud.

At Retruster, we understand that first and foremost you have a business to run - we don’t put extra stress on your servers, and you won’t notice us in loading speeds or email delivery times at all. The product is fast and effective.
